text: William Edward "Bill" Phipps (February 4, 1922 - June 1, 2018) was a retired American actor and producer. He was best known for his roles in dozens of classic sci-fi and westerns, both in movies and on television. He was known for making the voice of Prince Charming in Walt Disney's Cinderella (1950). Phipps died at his home in Santa Monica, California from complications of lung cancer on June 1, 2018 at the age of 96.William Phipps, Voice of Prince Charming in 'Cinderella' and Sci-Fi Movie Star, Dies at 96 ==References== ==Other websites== * *William Edward "Bill" Phipps fan page at Facebook *Interview with William Phipps in Tom Weaver's book "Double Feature Creature Attack", at Google Books Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Indiana Category:Movie producers from Chicago
title: William Phipps
